title: Riot mystery gift?
body: so i logged in and i got a mystery gift from riot. there was a button and that said awesome and after i clicked on it, it disappeared.  It didn't tell me what i got? can someone help.. pls?

replies.body: Check your icons and your skins, it was likely either a little poro with a party hat icon (it's yellow-ish) or it was Riot Kayle. Both were a gift from Riot for the 10 year anniversary.
